message.name: INF_REDETERMINE_TRANSLATOR_FAILURE_SUB
message.locale: Automatic re-determination of translator requirements failed on case %1s of type %2s for %3s.

message.name: INF_REDETERMINE_TRANSLATOR_FAILURE_TXT
message.locale: The system was unable to automatically re-determine whether or not a translator is required for the case participants of case %1s, based on a change to the language skills of the case owner. Please review the case and manually update the information as required.
